column1: 1.     Accident rates per 100 million vehicle kilometres are derived from figures quoted in the GMTU Report 1580
2.     A roads include A57(M) but exclude the A627(M).
3.     Some 'car' accidents may also involve 'goods' and vice-versa. Thus, there may be fewer 'all vehicle' accidents
than the total of 'car' and 'goods' accidents.
